description: This is a client entry point file for a Remix application, responsible for hydrating the app on the client side by rendering the RemixBrowser component within React's StrictMode.

methods.name: startTransition
methods.description: Manages concurrent rendering by scheduling state updates, here used for hydration process.

methods.name: hydrateRoot
methods.description: Hydrates the React app into the DOM, replacing any existing server-rendered markup.
